verification.accredited_by: Approved by The International EPD® System Technical Committee, supported by the Secretariat

product_description.product_category: Portland cement, aluminous cement, slag cement and similar hydraulic cements, except in the form of clinkers
product_description.manufacturing_location: Villaluenga de la Sagra, Toledo, Spain
product_description.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of product ready to be sent to the customer
product_description.hazardous_substances: No substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern (SVHC) used in a percentage higher than 0.1% of the product weight

lca_information.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of ECOPlanet CEM IV/A (P) 42.5 R-SR
exclusion_reasons: Product physically integrated with other products during installation and cannot be physically separated at end of life
Product no longer identified at end of life due to physical-chemical transformation
Product does not contain biogenic carbon
excluded_processes: Manufacture of equipment, buildings or capital goods
Transport of people to and inside manufacturing plants

electricity_mix.source: Supplier specific electricity mix demonstrated by guarantee of origin

lca_information.allocation: Only for verified direct emissions of the furnace where clinker is used to produce different cements
lca_information.cut_off_rules: At least 95% of total input flows (mass and energy) per module included
lca_information.data_quality: High, based on representative geography, recent data, third-party verified direct emissions, and inclusion in PRTR and EU Emissions Trade System

transport_and_installation.transport_included: Yes, all transportation and components included with real loads and distances for 2022
transport_and_installation.installation: Product physically integrated during installation; no separate end-of-life treatment

end_of_life.reason: Product physically integrated and transformed; no separate end-of-life identification or treatment

carbon_emission_context.greenhouse_gas_emissions_gwp_ghg: 562.04 kg CO2 eq (gross emissions including secondary fuels)

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_components_considered: Yes, from selection and processing plant of recovered materials
recycled_materials_handling.alternative_fuels: Used to reduce direct GHG emissions in clinker manufacturing

company_information.description: Holcim España owns five cement factories in Spain with over seven million tons/year capacity, multiple concrete and mortar plants, terminals, and a waste recovery plant. It employs over 700 people and has R&D and quality laboratories.
company_information.sustainability_commitment: Decarbonizing operations, products, and built environment; recycling via Geocycle; offering low-carbon products like ECOPlanet and ECOPact; protecting water and biodiversity.
certifications: Carbon Footprint National Registry of Spain with labels 'Calculo' and 'Reduzco'
